channel.title: SQLite on Kshitijaa Jaglan
channel.description: Recent content in SQLite on Kshitijaa Jaglan

item.title: Discord Bot
item.description: Developed a discord bot to manage transactions by 20 organizers for 71 participants for a college event The bot was created using Discord.py and connected to sqlite for data storage, hosted and used in the event server with options to view the scoreboard, change scores, view history etc.
